name: Tupapals
description:
Tupapals is a monster battler game designed by lifelong fans of the series, focusing on a nostalgic, retro feel and competitive singles battling.

Currently available is a demo that contains the endgame area complete with multiplayer and pve battling, as well as areas to catch and train your own Tupapals. We are looking for as much community feedback as possible for how to continue development and balancing decisions so come give it a try!

You can also join our discord at https://discord.gg/ApEsv8y to get involved!
